mar_v4l2_mmap_camera.c File Reference

Contains camera interfacing code for the MAR library for cameras which are V4L2 compliant and are capable of memory mapping. More...

Detailed Description

Contains camera interfacing code for the MAR library for cameras which are V4L2 compliant and are capable of memory mapping.

Author:
Greg Eddington

Function Documentation

MAR_PUBLIC mar_error_code mar_v4l2_mmap_camera_free ( mar_v4l2_mmap_camera *  camera  ) 

Frees a camera created by the MAR library.

Parameters:
camera The camera to free
Returns:
MAR_ERROR_NONE on success, an error code on failure

Referenced by mar_camera_free().

unsigned char* mar_v4l2_mmap_camera_get_frame_buffer ( mar_v4l2_mmap_camera *  camera  ) 

Returns the camera's frame buffer in an RGB24 format.

The frame buffer is 3 * width * height in size.

Parameters:
camera The camera to get the frame buffer of.
Returns:
The camera buffer.

References mar_v4l2_mmap_camera::frame_buffer.

Referenced by mar_camera_get_frame_buffer().

mar_camera_format  format,
int  width,
int  height 
)

Initializes the camera portion of MAR.

Parameters:
cam A pointer to a pointer which will be modified to point at a new camera
dev_name The camera device
format The camera pixel format
width The camera resolution width
height The camera resolution height
Returns:
MAR_ERROR_NONE on success, an error code on failure
